content:
Intelligentsia Coffee is a popular spot among coffee enthusiasts.

Yes, Intelligentsia Coffee offers dairy-free milk alternatives. They typically have almond milk, soy milk, and coconut milk available as substitutes for traditional dairy milk. You can ask your barista to make your latte with any of these options.

In fact, Intelligentsia is known for their attention to detail and high-quality ingredients, including their non-dairy milks. They source their almond milk and soy milk from a local supplier, and their coconut milk is made in-house.

When you order, simply let the barista know that you'd like a dairy-free milk alternative, and they'll take care of the rest. They might even ask if you have a preference for a specific non-dairy milk, so be prepared to let them know your choice.

Enjoy your visit to Intelligentsia, and I hope you love your latte!
